title.narrative: CHILD RIGHTS AND BUSINESS

description.narrative: Child Rights and Business OutputKey business stakeholder adopt policies and practices that are aligned with the Children's Rights and Business Principles, which contributes to Private Sector Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programmes are efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children in development and humanitarian setting.

mailing-address.narrative: 31st Floor Yuchengco Tower Rizal Commercial Banking Corporation (RCBC) Plaza 6819 Ayala Avenue corner Gil Puyat Avenue Makati City

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Child Rights and Business OutputKey business stakeholder adopt policies and practices that are aligned with the Children's Rights and Business Principles

description.narrative: In 2019, UNICEF PCO forged strategic partnerships with key businesses, business associations, and government agencies to raise the level of awareness within the business community on child rights in business, build interest for training on the Children's Rights and Business Principles and work with specific industries to address their impacts on children. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/02/2020
